name: Fantasy Heroes
description: Sample data for designing card templates - Fantasy theme

cards.title: Dragon Slayer
cards.subtitle: Legendary Warrior
cards.description: A battle-hardened warrior who has slain countless dragons in the Northern Peaks.

cards.title: Forest Guardian
cards.subtitle: Nature's Protector
cards.description: An ancient spirit bound to protect the Emerald Woods from corruption.

cards.title: Shadow Assassin
cards.subtitle: Silent Death
cards.description: Moves unseen through darkness, striking before enemies can react.

cards.title: Village Healer
cards.subtitle: Keeper of Life
cards.description: A humble healer who tends to the sick and wounded in the village square.
